content: For the music director. A Maskil of David, when Doeg the Edomite came and told Saul and said to him, “David has come to the house of Ahimelech.”
The faithfulness of God  all day long.
Like a sharp razor, you worker of deceit.
You love evil more than good,
Lies more than speaking what is right.
You love all words that devour,
